overview: The film tells the story of Putra who manages a quick-money scheme that deals with gold investment. Unfortunately, Putra was unsuccessful and he even got scammed until he was hunted by his creditors. To add salt to his wounds, Putra's fiance leaves him because he is not able to keep up with the promised amount of dowry, while his siblings shun him because they are embarrassed by his failures. He has an unexpected encounter with a woman named Mira, who introduces him to a digital currency called Crypto. With the support of his beloved mother and Mira, Putra finally succeeds.
title: Budak Kripto
